channel.title: The new Private server non crashuble!
channel.description: I am using the new server known as Aerocursion_Kingdom I am having problems with it. When i log out it saves my charecter but where does it save it??? It does'nt have a charecter folder???? Does any1 know how i could make a charcter folder for it?? The server also does'nt have a banlog, and a ipbanlog?? How do i add these?

item.title: The new Private server non crashuble!
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Sane:

Just dont use its its very unstable and shitty.

No, it isn’t.
It is a very stable source - not the stablest - but I think, personally, that it is the stablest and easiest to use source for new users released to date.
Of course MySQL servers are always very nice, but complicated for younger users.
This source is very easy to use.

Oh, and this isn’t based off of TestScape, it’s based of wL.

Read full topic
item.source: The new Private server non crashuble!
